smartgov.urban.osm.environment.graph.sinkSourceNodes

Class OsmSinkNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • smartgov.core.environment.graph.GraphItem

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SinkNode

    public class OsmSinkNode
extends AbstractOsmSinkSourceNode
implements SinkNode
    A special OsmNode where agents disappear. For example, such nodes are built from nodes with no outgoing arcs in provided examples.
    See Also:
    OsmNode, SinkNode
